2012:
{playlist2012}
2012 First Podcast by BradLUG
December's broadcast of IT Stuff on BCB Radio 106.6 FM - The first podcast ever by the members of BradLUG. Includes a special report by Brian on "The Raspberry Pi Bake" in Leeds.
Oggs: IT Stuff Archive Audio

drive:
{drivetime}
Drive Time Interview with shi
shi gets a surprise interview for the Drive Time show broadcast on BCB Radio 106.6 FM, July 2014. May or may not include pantomime. Bring peanuts.
Ogg: IT Stuff Archive Audio

head:
IT STUFF
Explaining the good stuff in IT & treating the bad stuff with the cynicism and contempt that it deserves.
latesmusic:
{latesmusiclist}
National Media Museum Lates: Interviews by shi
Quick and dirty interviews with some of the fantastic exhibitors at the event which took place at Bradford's National Media Museum.
Oggs: IT Stuff Archive Audio

win10:
{win10cast}
BCB Interview with Dave Spencer
Listen in as Dave Spencer reveals all in this public service announcement on the recent Windows 10. A special interview by BCB Radio 106.6 FM, August 2015. On loop! Well, kinda.
